counting down... {count}

> {/if} > ```

The `` element allows a component to recursively include itself. It must be placed inside an if or each block, or passed to a component's slot to prevent infinite loops. Example: ```svelte {#if count > 0}

counting down... {count}

{:else}

lift-off!

{/if} ``` **Note:** This feature is obsolete. Modern Svelte allows components to import themselves directly instead of using ``.
The `<svelte:self>` element enables recursive component inclusion when wrapped in conditional blocks. This feature is now obsolete as components can self-import directly.
Legacy feature for recursive component inclusion; now obsolete in favor of direct self-imports.
